ComicInfo.Title: Behind Enemy Lines
ComicInfo.Summary: Behind Enemy Lines: Opens in Pineville, PA, 1945. Dejah and Marohk are in a theatre while Llana and Clyde try to fix a car. Some G-men show up and attack Dejah only to be mind controlled by Marohk. Clyde and Llana battle the G-men. Meanwhile WWII soldiers surround the theatre. Llana attacks the soldiers, and with the help of Marohk's mind control, defeats them. They make their escape and go to the Carter estate and meet Edgar Rice Burroughs who invites them in and they come head on into the Therns.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 20:16:44. [CVDB799861] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 09:37:53. [Issue ID 2133449]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brent Peeples,Joseph Michael Linsner,Lucio Parrillo,Roberto Castro,Vasco Georgiev
ComicInfo.Characters: Llana,Clyde Jefferson,Edgar Rice Burroughs,Marohk the Kaldane,Dejah Thoris
